definitions.title: pers. 1. n. pr. loc.
definitions.body: [[יׇבֵשׁ גִּלְעָד]] Jabesh of Gilead, LXX Iab(e)iv Galaad, exact site unknown, Ju Jdg 21:8, Jdg 21:9, Jdg 21:10, Jdg 21:12, Jdg 21:14; 2Sa 21:12; 1Ch 10:11 (LXXL Iabiv th=v Galaad); [[יׇבֵישׁ גִּלְעָד]] 1Sa 11:1, 1Sa 11:9, 1Sa 31:11, 2Sa 2:4, 2Sa 2:5 (in these three LXXL Iabiv th=v Galaatiditov); [[יׇבֵישׁ]] 1Sa 11:1, 1Sa 11:3, 1Sa 11:5, 1Sa 11:9, 1Sa 11:10; [[יׇבֵשׁ]] 1Ch 10:12; [[יׇבֵָישָׁה]] v:1Ch 10:12; ‖[[יׇבֵ֫שָׁה]] 1Sa 31:12, 1Sa 31:13.
